content.paragraph1: I'm a quiet architect — a developer who spent years behind the scenes, crafting clean code while the spotlight favored noise.
content.paragraph2: After stepping away into the crypto world — where I found both financial freedom and perspective — I came back to coding with a new tool at my side: AI.
content.paragraph3: In my first weeks back, I built a mission-critical access control system in 15 days, a multilingual portfolio site in 2, and a full MEWS → Directo integration in 6 hours.
content.paragraph4: Not because I rushed — but because I finally let go of the drag.
content.paragraph5: I work fast, but I think deeply. I let AI handle the boilerplate — I focus on architecture and clarity.
content.paragraph6: I'm not chasing a title. I'm building with intent.
content.paragraph7: I'm here to solve problems that matter.
